<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81805</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81805</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4533</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Italian Reading Comprehension (4)</string>
            <string language="es">Comprensión de lectura en italiano (4)</string>
            <string language="ga">Léamhthuiscint Iodáilise (4)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisches Leseerfassen (4)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension Italienne de Lecture (4)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão Italiana Da Leitura (4)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione Italiana Della Lettura (4)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλική κατανόηση ανάγνωσης (4)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Literary passage dealing with the themes of money and life choices. Students should analyse the passage for its main points, discover some vocabulary associated with money matters, and look for grammatical details.</string>
            <string language="es">Pasaje literario que trata sobre los asuntos del dinero y las elecciones en la vida. Los estudiantes deberían analizar el pasaje buscando sus principales puntos, descubrir el vocabulario asociado con los asuntos de dinero y buscar detalles gramaticales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sliocht liteartha a dhéileálann le téamaí an airgid agus roghanna saoil. Ba cheart do dhaltaí anailís a dhéanamh ar an sliocht chun a phríomhphointí a aimsiú, roinnt foclóra a fhoghlaim a bhaineann le ceisteanna airgid agus sonraí gramadaí a chuardach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Italian</string>
            <string language="es">Italiano. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Iodáilis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literarischer Durchgang, der die Themen des 
Geldes und der Lebenwahlen beschäftigt. Kursteilnehmer sollten 
den Durchgang für seine Hauptsachen analysieren, etwas Wortschatz 
entdecken, der mit Geldstoffen verbunden ist, und nach grammatischen 
Details suchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Passage littéraire traitant les thèmes de 
l'argent et des choix de la vie. Les étudiants devraient 
analyser le passage pour ses points principaux, découvrir un certain 
vocabulaire lié aux sujets d'argent, et rechercher les détails 
grammaticaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Passagem literária que trata dos temas do 
dinheiro e das escolhas da vida. Os estudantes devem analisar a 
passagem para seus pontos principais, descobrir algum vocabulário 
associado com as matérias do dinheiro, e procurar detalhes 
gramaticais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Passaggio letterario che si occupa dei temi di 
soldi e delle scelte di vita. Gli allievi dovrebbero analizzare 
il passaggio per i relativi punti principali, scoprire un certo 
vocabolario connesso con gli argomenti dei soldi e cercare i 
particolari grammaticali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνική μετάβαση που εξετάζει τα θέματα των 
επιλογών χρημάτων και ζωής. Οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να 
αναλύσουν τη μετάβαση για τα βασικά σημεία του, να ανακαλύψουν 
κάποιο λεξιλόγιο που συνδέεται με τα θέματα χρημάτων, και να 
ψάξουν τις γραμματικές λεπτομέρειες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Italienisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Italien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Italiano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιταλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
